Posts.Content: Dec 6, 2007 11:34AM TexasGirl wrote: I just had my anesthesiology consult and they suggested this  Paravertebral block.  It sounds like a lot less pain after surgery, faster recovery, less pain meds and less side effects from Anesthestic.  I am a little nervous about it.  My sugery is a modified radical mastectomy with axillary dissection on 12/11.  I am a little nervous about this since they only give you a lite general anestestic, but I think I am going to do it since recovery time is shorter.  Anyone that has had this, I would appreciate your experience.  If not, I will let you know the difference from General anesthestic.  I have GE at least 6 time and always have nausea or vomiting.
Posts.Title: Ansthesia choics MauiKay iodine
